title: Extended Anki Add-on Manifest
description: Anki's add-on manifest schema, extended by a number of keys custom to aab

package.description: The module/package the add-on is imported as, i.e. the name of the add-on folder.

name.description: The name displayed in Anki's UI (e.g. in the add-on list)

mod.description: The time the add-on was last modified (unix epoch)

conflicts.title: Conflicting Add-ons
conflicts.description: A list of other packages that conflict

min_point_version.description: the minimum 2.1.x version this add-on supports

max_point_version.description: If negative, abs(n) is the maximum 2.1.x version this add-on supports. If positive, indicates version tested on, and is ignored

branch_index.description: AnkiWeb sends this to indicate which branch the user downloaded

human_version.description: Human-readable version string set by the add-on creator

version.description: [aab] Version string, set to the same value as human_version

author.description: [aab] The main author/maintainer/publisher of the add-on.

homepage.description: [aab] Homepage of the add-on project (e.g. GitHub repository link)
